content:
Craft an item of type: dark_oak_sign
inventory=[{"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 2, "index": 17}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 28, "index": 23}, {"type": "infested_stone", "quantity": 18, "index": 24}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_skull", "quantity": 46, "index": 33}]
thought: To craft a dark_oak_sign, I need to first craft dark_oak_planks, which require a dark_oak_wood. Therefore, I will move the dark_oak_wood from slot 17 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: dark_oak_sign
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 28, "index": 23}, {"type": "infested_stone", "quantity": 18, "index": 24}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_skull", "quantity": 46, "index": 33}]
thought: After crafting the dark_oak_planks, I will move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 11) so that I can use them to craft the dark_oak_sign.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

thought: To craft a dark_oak_sign, I first need to craft dark_oak_planks. I have some dark_oak_planks already in my inventory (slot 11), but I need more than 4, so I will first craft more dark_oak_planks. I can do this by moving the dark_oak_wood from slot 17 to the crafting grid (eg., slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
